6-10.text: The strike lost something in the translation.

11-15.text: Foe evades your much of your swing. You have initiative.

16-20.text: Foe steps back 5 feet. He is out of position.

21-35.text: Foe tries to duck under your strike. You knock him back.

36-45.text: Bust foe's shin. You have initiative.

46-50.text: Foe steps under your blow. You catch him in the back.

51-55.text: Blow to foe's chest. Foe leans sideways in pain.

56-60.text: Blow to foe's waist sends a piece of equipment flying. Foe recoils.

66-66.text: Shatter shoulder in foe's shield arm. Arm is quite useless. Foe drops shield, if he has one.

67-70.text: Solid strike to foe's chest. Knocks the breath out of foe.

71-75.text: Shot takes foe in lower leg. He fails to jump over it.

76-80.text: Blow to foe's shield arm destroys shield. If no shield, arm is broken.

81-85.text: Blow to foe's side sends him stumbling 5 feet to your right.

86-90.text: Strike foe in lower back. Muscles and cartilage are damaged.

96-99.text: Blow to foe's head. If foe has no helm, he is dead. If foe has a helm, he is knocked down.

100-100.text: Crush foe's jaw. Drive bone through brain. Foe dies instantly.

11-15.text: Foe evades frantically. You have the initiative next round.

16-20.text: Foe is concerned with his own preservation. He steps back 5 feet.

21-35.text: Foe loses some resolve from your solid strike.

36-45.text: Blow to foe's left calf. You gain initiative.

46-50.text: Solid blow to back. Foe seeks to avoid this attack again. He has lost his way.

51-55.text: Foe recoils before your blow impacts. He steps back 5 feet to defend himself.

56-60.text: Strike passes under shield arm and lands on foe's thigh. Big bruise.

61-65.text: Blow to foe's forearm. The strike is solid. The pain is certain.

66-66.text: Drive elbow backwards and break it. Arm is useless. Foe drops weapon, leans way over, and yells out.

67-70.text: Bloom! Shot strikes foe's upper chest. Foe stumbles.

71-75.text: Strike to foe's right achilles tendon. Oh that hurts ya know!

76-80.text: Blow to foe's shield arm breaks wrist. Hand is useless. Foe drops shield.

81-85.text: Blow thunders as it connects. Foe's ribs crackle in response. It hurts.

86-90.text: Foe makes a mistake and pays. You send him prone with a fell strike. Tendons are smashed.

91-95.text: Strike to foe's head. If he has no helm, he falls into a coma for 3 weeks.

96-99.text: Blast foe's chest. Send ribcage into heart. Foe drops and dies in 6 rounds.

100-100.text: Blow snaps neck. Foe is paralyzed from the shoulders down.

06-10.text: You should have swung much harder.

11-15.text: Really solid strike to foe's shield side. You have initiative.

16-20.text: Blow to foe's waist. He spins sideways.

21-35.text: Disorient foe with a tricky shot. He is at a loss for words.

36-45.text: Catch foe in lower leg. You gain initiative, while foe regains footing.

46-50.text: He leans to your shield side and you hit him in the back. You have the initiative for 2 rounds.

51-55.text: Hard strike to chest, armor does not help.

56-60.text: Strike grazes across left thigh and lands on right. It lands solid.

61-65.text: Catch foe in mid-swing and disarm him. His weapon tumbles behind you.

66-66.text: That does it for him. Your strike lands on foe's knee. The knee buckles and foe goes down hard.

67-70.text: Strike to chest causes a host of trouble.

76-80.text: Strike through muscle in shield arm. If foe has a shield, he drops it.

81-85.text: Blow to foe's weapon arm. A metal armguard is bent and the arm is useless until until the armor is removed.

injuries.right-arm-useless: A metal armguard is bent and the arm is useless until until the armor is removed.

86-90.text: Powerful blow sweeps foe onto his back. Bones break and muscles tear.

injuries.back-bones-broken: Bones break and muscles tear. Critical effect.

91-95.text: Blow to thigh. Compound fracture severs an artery. Foe goes down hard and dies in 12 rounds.

96-99.text: Blow to foe's abdomen. Strike destroys a variety of organs. Poor fool expires after 6 rounds of inactivity.

100-100.text: Strike to forehead. Destroy foe's eyes. Send his helm flying. Foe is spun about.

06-10.text: Foe steps right, then left, and almost evades your blow.

11-15.text: Shot close to foe's throat. He seeks to avoid your next strike.

16-20.text: Glancing blow takes skin with it. You have initiative next round.

21-35.text: Foe goes airborne to evade your strike. He is stumbling back.

36-45.text: Light swing to foe's leg. Foe's calf is bruised. You have the initiative.

46-50.text: Catch foe in shoulder blade. Foe drops his guard and reels from your blow.

51-55.text: Blow to foe's ribs. It hurts him to raise his arms. Foe cannot lean over.

56-60.text: Miss foe's arm and strike his thigh. He stumbles and drops something.

61-65.text: Blow to forearm. Blow tears clothing, but not skin. Arm is bruised.

66-66.text: Masterful strike to foe's head. If he has no helm, he is dead. If he has a helm is knocked out for 4 hours.

71-75.text: Blow lands with a crack. Leg bone is broken. Major cartilage damage.

76-80.text: Sling foe's weapon to the right 5 feet. Foe's arm is useless. Tendon damage.

81-85.text: Blow lands on foe's side. He goes down hard. Victory is close.

86-90.text: Blow to foe's neck. If foe has a throat protector, he is paralyzed from the neck down. If not, he dies in two rounds.

91-95.text: Strike comes down on the shield shoulder of foe. Arm shatters. Foe dies from shock and blood loss in 9 rounds.

96-99.text: Crush foe's chest cavity. He grips your arm, looks into your eyes, then drops and dies in 3 rounds.

100-100.text: Blast to foe's heart. It stops. He dies. You consider yourself to be deadly. Fine work. You are ready to slay.

01-05.text: Destroy one of foe's silly decorations.

06-10.text: Blow is forceful, not hard. Foe is unbalanced. You have initiative.

11-15.text: Foe raises an arm to block your strike. He does himself harm. You profit.

16-20.text: Strong blow breaks foe's guard. He is unbalanced.

21-35.text: Solid shot breaks foe's ribs. You have initiative next round.

36-45.text: Blow to upper leg. Minor fracture. You have initiative.

46-50.text: Glancing strike to lower back. Foe turns away to avoid the damage. Foe uses his weapon for balance.

51-55.text: Blow to chest. He seeks to regain his wind and survive your onslaught.

56-60.text: Blow to foe's thigh causes his right leg to falter for a moment.

61-65.text: Strike foe's weapon arm with a titanic blow. Foe drops his weapon and reels.

66-66.text: Crush what was once foeâ€™s head; he dies instantly. If foe has a helm it is destroyed also. You are speckled with blood.

67-70.text: Blow to foe's shield arm. If foe has a shield, it is broken. If not, arm is broken.

71-75.text: Blow to foe's hip bonebreaks it. Help! Foe has fallen and cannot get up.

76-80.text: Slap foe's arm and elbow around like string. Joint is shattered. Arm is useless. Foe should have stayed in bed.

81-85.text: Blow to foe's armpit. Crush ribs and destroy organs. Foe dies in 3 rounds.

86-90.text: Neck strike shatters bone and severs an artery. Foe cannot breath. Foe is inactive and suffocates in 12 rounds.

91-95.text: Blast to foe's back. A bone is driven into vital organs. Foe is down and dies in six rounds.

96-99.text: Blow to foe's face. If visored, the visor is driven into his face and foe dies in 10 rounds. Without a visor, he dies instantly. You have half the round left.

100-100.text: Blow turns hip to dust. Foe falls down. Attempts to stand. Falls again and dies in 6 rounds.
